text:
Hi folks! :wave:
Is there any additional libraries that you use on HubSpot hosted websites to improve their overall performance? Such as library for additional caching (equivalent of WPRocket for WordPress for example)? :thinkonk:

Caching is all done automatically, for best performance it's best to check if the page is being prerendered or not.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/cdn/prerendering>

hello <@U056K7NBBJQ>
There is a hubl filter for that, and it accepts a few predefined formas as well as custom formats using ldml.
See more info in the link below:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#format-date>

If you need further help just post here your progress

Hello Everyone!
Does anyone know how to enable payment while creating a Quote using HS API's?

Thanks
What <@UTS5PEGF6> said. I’d also check <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed|this doc on optimizing speed>

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
```Usage of Esign, Stripe payments, or HubSpot payments```
That would make sense, thank you Martin
Although their documentation says the alternate but :shrug:  lol

Hello guys @channel, I hope you are well, I have a problem to see if anyone knows what the problem is, I have my website created in wordpres with elementor connected to HubSpot and create a form of elementor and those data come to HubSpot, the porblema is that I am getting 2 forms, and it is only sometimes, keep in mind that the form has the option to add an image. know why I get 2 times ? in HubSpot clearly says that they are not forms created in HubSpot, osea is the form that created with elementor.

Hi all, quick question, can *SSO* be set up between an app and a HubSpot customer portal (service hub)? I'd like customers to log into the app and then go to the customer portal without re-logging in. Thanks in advance.

So you can definitely setup SSO for the customer portal but setting it up with a custom app is the question I don't quite know yet, let me see if I can find the docs for it. I think you can but just want to be sure:
Yep just checked the cloudflare docs on this and it sounds like this should work totally fine.
